TEXT.TITLE: WILLAMETTE INDUSTRIES <WMTT> 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 90 cts vs 30 cts Net 22.9 mln vs 7,567,000 Sales 323.0 mln vs 272.1 mln Note: per share figures reflect April 25, 1986 five-to-three stock split. Full year figures not available. Reuter
